meta.title: State College Area School District / State College Area School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: State College Area School District is located at 240 Villa Crest Drive State College, PA. in Centre County. The school serves kindergarten through twelfth grade.

meta.content: State College Area School District, SCASD, State College PA Schools, scasd calendar, scasd hac, Pennsylvania school districts, state college school district

State College Area School District is located at 240 Villa Crest Drive State College, PA. in Centre County. The school serves kindergarten through twelfth grade.

span.p: The district is now offering free public Wi-Fi Internet access in the parking lots at three locations: Panorama Village Administrative Center, Gray's Woods Elementary School and Ferguson Township Elementary School. Click here for details.

a.title: Go to comments for Internet access

span.strong: COVID-19 Coronavirus Information and Remote Learning Plan

p.span: For the current information, and a record of all of our emails, please visit our COVID-19 coronavirus information and preparedness website which also includes our remote learning plans.
If you are not receiving our district emails, please call our IT Support office at 814-231-7743 or email itsupport@scasd.org for assistance.

span.p: Meals are being provided weekly each Wednesday for all children under the age of 18 while schools are closed. Please click here for details.
For information about our remote learning plan, please visit this website.

p.strong: We continue to register students for the 2020-2021 school year!

span.img: During the closure for the COVID-19 pandemic, our registration office continues to accept new student registrations for the 2020-2021 school year. The online registration process is two steps. First, fill out the

p.span: . Second, submit all the supporting documents by email. Please note: If you don’t finish the second step, your registration is not complete. You can find more details about how to register on
. Thank you, and we can’t wait to welcome your child!

a.title: Go to comments for Online Registration

img.alt: Remote Learning Plan and COVID-19 Information

a.span: Remote Learning Plan and COVID-19 Information

div.p: Please visit our website for the latest information related to the State College Area School District closure including our remote learning plan and free meals distribution.

a.title: Go to comments for Remote Learning Plan and COVID-19 Information

a.span: Food Distribution to Children During Shutdown

div.p: By the distribution’s end four hours later, 989 bags with orders had been handed out, including 43 delivered to housebound families, totaling close to 10,000 meals — another successful installment of our effort to feed children while the school district is closed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

a.title: Go to comments for Food Distribution to Children During Shutdown

a.span: State High Quiz Bowl Team Competes Nationally

div.p: With tournaments cancelled because of the COVID-19 pandemic, the annually strong team recently switched to virtual competition, concluding its regular season in the WAIT Online Knowledge Event. Against a national field, the State High team finished 11th.

a.title: Go to comments for State High Quiz Bowl Team Competes Nationally

a.span: Scholastic Art & Writing National Gold Key award

div.p: Wenjun Leng recently received a 2020 Scholastic Art & Writing National Gold Key award for his painting, “Disillusioned,” one of 2,900 artistic and literary works earning national acclaim.

a.title: Go to comments for Scholastic Art & Writing National Gold Key award

div.p: “The philosophy behind it,” Kathy Seeland says, “is we want kids to do science instead of just learn science content.” And that’s exactly what’s happening in Seeland’s anatomy and physiology class at State High.

a.title: Go to comments for Hands-on Anatomy and Physiology Class
